name: Project F
description:
"Project F" is a 5-on-5 tactical FPS game, where an attacking team and a defending team engage in a battle over a defensive target known as 'The monolith'.
The defending team positions the monolith anywhere within a building and defend it for a specific duration.
Otherwise, the attacking team need to complete the hacking of the monolith in time.
Both teams also win by annihilating all of the enemy teams.

A map that is automatically generated for each match.
A new map is automatically generated for each game, where players can attack and defend.
The same map will be used during one game, which consists of up to 13 rounds, but the next game will be played on a completely new map.
Players are not expected to study a fixed map, but to understand and come up with strategies for a new map more quickly.

Characters with unique abilities.
Each of the characters in the game has unique abilities.
For example, a route that can destroy walls is a key element of strategy, showing allies the way through enemy lines.
Reefers, who can jump through space and move at a moment's notice, lead their allies ahead of the battle front.

In-game weapon purchase system.
As a bonus for defeating enemies in a round or for getting a round, you earn points to purchase weapons, armor, and gadgets.
Which weapons you purchase and when are very important choices in game making throughout the round.
